descriptionHtml:
this mod was simply made because many players commented on my other mod \"Stronger Arrows+\" Asking if i could make a Dawnguard edition with Stronger Bolts. so the ARROWS now do 20 more DMG than what it used to be EXAMPLE \"If the steel ARROWS WE\'RE 10 DMG t would now be 30 DMG.

link to STRONGER ARROWS+: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=108226838&searchtext=

There are NO bugs so far so hopefully this mod turns out better than the last one which made the Steel Arrow only 3% of DMG instead of 30%.

Dont forget to COMMENT,FAVORITE & SUBCRIBE, Thanks

-CriticalHittz :)
author: CriticalHittz
